00129 inline int CEdgeLine::GetNodesCount() const
00130 {
00131        return m_nodes.size();
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 inline int CEdgeLine::GetSegmentsCount() const
00136 {
00137        return m_isClosed? m_nodes.size(): m_nodes.size() - 1;
00138 }

00173 inline void CEdgeLine::EnsureVolatileValid() const
00174 {
00175        if (!m_areVolatileValid){
00176               CalcVolatile();
00177 
00178               m_areVolatileValid = true;
00179        }
00180 }
